article.title: Denmark Procures Mission Avionics and Common Cockpit
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Mission Systems & Training, Owego, N.Y., is being awarded $67,290,982 for firm-fixed-price delivery order 4085 against a previously issued basic ordering agreement (N00019-09-G-0005) for mission avionics and common cockpit; to include Danish specific equipment, non-recurring engineering, program support and associated efforts required for the production and delivery of nine MH-60R aircraft for the Government of Denmark under the foreign military sales (FMS) program. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity.
